name: Slime Towers
description:
You have fallen into a deep crystal cavern full of cute slimes and hostile crystal creatures. With the only way out being up, you must collect materials from the surrounding caves and use Slime Power to defend your drill while it ascends to the surface. When you're ready, hop into the drill and watch your defensive strategy play out!

Controls
Movement: WASD Keys
Interact Key: E
Pause Menu: ESC Key
Run: Hold L-Shift
